name: Fall Leaves
description: A colorful mix of Oak, Birch and Maple leaves for your fall or
full_text: A colorful mix of Oak, Birch and Maple leaves for your fall or holiday décor. Use as garland, coasters or just sprinkle around the room for that fall pop of color. Pattern uses one Fall Festival Bundle. EXPERIENCE LEVEL Intermediate MATERIALS Woolstok (Worsted) Bundle (100% Fine Highland Wool, 21 mini hanks: 5g/12yds each): 1 bundle (Fall Festival) Size 6 (4mm) needles, or size needed to obtain gauge Size 6 (4mm) double pointed needles, or size needed to obtain gauge Tapestry needle FINISHED MEASUREMENTS Birch: 4¼“ height by 3” width Maple: 3½“ height by 4½” width Oak: 4¾“ height by 3½” width (Height does not include stem) COLORS SHOWN Fall Festival Bundle
